features: 8 Years One Booster - for your big kid from 40 - 120 lb. It's all you will ever need.
Built for comfort for every size - our XL backless booster is optimized for comfort and safety with built-in padded armrests and finished with deep padded cushioning.
Two built-in retractable 2-in-1 cup holder and snack tray - keeps your big kid's drink close at hand and stows away their essentials.
Our contoured premium soft fabrics - with layered foam padding that provide comfort and support and can be easily removed for machine washing.
Shoulder belt positioner - helps to properly position the vehicle seat shoulder belt, and easy access to seatbelt buckle help your big kid with self buckling - don't forget to check though!
body.description: Solana 2 XL backless booster seat is perfect for when your big kid needs a little boost. Suitable from 40 - 120 lb (18-54 kg.) Built for child comfort and parent convenience with easy-to-use features, expect 8 years of safety from just one booster seat. Awarded IIHS Best Bet Booster Seat, Solana 2s extra wide design has plenty of room for your childs hips and legs. The ergonomic car seat base has been designed for complete child comfort and features 2x 2-in-1 fold-away cup holders and storage compartments to accommodate all your little one's cups, toys, and more on the move. Life with your little one is never dull, so why would your booster seat be? Weve introduced a variety of bright and comfortable fabric covers to Solana 2 that can be easily removed and machine-washed for effortless care. Weighing only 6.1 lbs, the Solana 2 is super lightweight and allows you to move the seat between vehicles with ease. Integrated LATCH connectors and front adjusters allow you to quickly tighten the booster to the vehicle seat. Whether youre taking them to school, on a playdate with a friend, or an overnight visit with grandparents, the Solana 2 backless booster seat will always provide a comfortable and safe journey.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Diono Engineering Keeping growing kids secure with Ultra Wide Design, Ergonomic Contoured Base and Comfort Cushioning, Easy Adjust LATCH Connectors, Shoulder Belt Positioning Guide, Integrated 2-in-1 Belt Path Guides and Arm Rests, Lightweight Design, and 2x 2-in-1 Fold Away Cup Holders for snacks, drinks and toys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great booster seat! Kids say they are very comfortable and have more room
reviews.reviewText: These are great booster seats but be advised they are wider than a normal car seat (see dimensions in description). We have plenty of room in our backseat and the seat buckles are wide enough the seats fit perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for bigger kids.
reviews.reviewText: I am so glad I found this car seat. My 6 year old is 105 pounds and 51” tall. He has low muscle tone which makes it hard for him to sit up. This seat is perfect : it’s wide enough he can sit comfortably, it has him up a bit higher the his last so the seat belt sits correctly and it has a slight incline towards the back of the seat so he can sit and relax.It has a wonder latch system that was easy to install in just seconds. It is also easy to uninstall and move for car to car. It’s light weight and easy to clean!This is and over all amazing car seat it is sturdy enough for our bigger kiddos for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A lot comphier than the others, higher up too!
reviews.reviewText: The two pack was great as we have 2 cars. These are higher up than most seats which helps little one to see forward past a passenger which helps with motion sickness. Really comfortable seat compared to less expensive versions and the cloth is really nice quality. The cheaper seat we had would catch easy on everything - not this new seat! It cleans really easy too. The wider seat stays put in my car even without the latch system. Love the double cup holders and snack area. I can even have them both open cupholders when the seat is next to the door (which i wasnt sure I could do). The 2pack is a bargain and these are nicely built boosters!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality but big
reviews.reviewText: Great booster seats and love the latch system. They are wide so if you have 2 of them they pretty much take up the whole back seat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the purchased!!
reviews.reviewText: Great quality and easy to ensemble. It’s very comfortable. I bought it for my 4 year old and he loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great seat. Too wide for many 3rd rows.
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic in terms of build quality, ease of use, and installation. Unfortunately because it's so wide, it covers the seatbelt buckle when we try to use it in the 3rd row of our 2021 Highlander. We'll hold onto it and use it in the second row occasionally, but I wish they made a slightly narrower version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great size! Small cup holders
reviews.reviewText: This booster is a great size and very comfortable (my son says so). It is very thick with padding. The latches work extremely efficiently and are very easy to work. My only complaint is the retractable cup holders on either side... they are VERY small and difficult for my son to open.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my little big kid
reviews.reviewText: So my little girl who is nine is on the petite side for sure, and did not want a high back booster anymore. I confirmed with the pediatrician that it was OK to switch over because I’m always airing on the side of caution. I am a nurse, what can I say? I was a little skeptical because I wasn’t sure how it would fit, and if it would be comfortable based on a couple of the conflicting reviews but I have to tell you that I am so impressed! I am fully confident in the safety and love how comfortable it is for my daughter! It has a removable cover if we need to wash it. I also love the cupholders as an added bonus. I have a 2018 Toyota forerunner and it fits perfectly in the back. It also fits perfectly in my husbands GMC truck. I have not tried it out on a smaller vehicle but I don’t think it would be a huge difference as far as the fit is concerned I actually think I’m going to buy another one to put in Grandma’s Honda. I definitely did my research, and I am very happy with my purchase, and my being reluctance to change from a high-back booster to just a booster, was eased with this purchase. If you were on the fence like I was, I can tell you that you just have to think of it like this, it’s Amazon, if you don’t like it, or it doesn’t fit, just return it!
Perfect combination of needs. Daughter is comfortable and feels safe in it. Quick and easy to buckle her in. Pulls tight. Love that it anchors in so there is no movement.
Llegó bien, me gustó que tuviera anclaje de Isofix y para la cabecera. A mi hijo le parece cómodo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Can't go wrong with a Diono
reviews.reviewText: We have bought multiple Diono products over the years given their high quality and this booster seat similarly doesn't disappoint.We bought it in blue as blue is our son's favorite colour. He was thrilled with how it looked.The booster itself is lightweight for its size and yet feels sturdy and high quality.If you have used LATCH anchors before, installation will be a breeze. If you haven't used them before, it will still be a breeze. Removal is also a simple process.The only watch out is this is a large booster seat. We cannot use it in our small hatchback bc the unit impedes the seatbelt from connecting properly.This booster should fit comfortably, however, in any sedan and easily in any SUV (we have it installed in our compact SUV).Overall, a solid purchase that we are happy with!
Es fuerte y de buen tamaño
